00014 /* Please note that
00015  * __INTEL_COMPILER, __BORLANDC__ and _MSC_VER
00016  * conditionals are included for the users's convenience, but are not supported by Imperas.
00017  */

00021 #ifndef IMPTYPES_H
00022 #define IMPTYPES_H

00024 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
00025     #error "Please use -mno-cygwin flag to gcc/cygwin compiler"
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 #if (IMPERAS_WINDOWS==1)
00029     #define IMPERAS_UNAME  "Windows"
00030     #define IMPERAS_SHRSUF "dll"
00031 #else
00032     #define IMPERAS_UNAME  "Linux"
00033     #define IMPERAS_SHRSUF "so"
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #if (IMPERAS_WINDOWS==1)
00037 
00038     #if defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00039 
00040         #define FUNC_NAME __FUNCTION__
00041 
00042         #define __uint8_t   unsigned __int8
00043         #define __int8_t    __int8
00044         #define __uint16_t  unsigned __int16
00045         #define __int16_t   __int16
00046         #define __uint32_t  unsigned __int32
00047         #define __int32_t   __int32
00048         #define __uint64_t  unsigned __int64
00049         #define __int64_t   __int64
00050 
00051         // get rid of the GCCism __attribute__
00052         #define __attribute__(X)
00053     #elif defined(__BORLANDC__)
00054 
00055         #define FUNC_NAME __FUNCTION__
00056 
00057         #define __uint8_t   unsigned char
00058         #define __int8_t    signed   char
00059         #define __uint16_t  unsigned short
00060         #define __int16_t   signed   short
00061         #define __uint32_t  unsigned int
00062         #define __int32_t   signed   int
00063         #define __uint64_t  unsigned __int64
00064         #define __int64_t   signed   __int64
00065 
00066         // get rid of the GCCism __attribute__
00067         #define __attribute__(X)
00068     #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00069         #define FUNC_NAME __FUNCTION__
00070 
00071         #define __uint8_t   unsigned __int8
00072         #define __int8_t    __int8
00073         #define __uint16_t  unsigned __int16
00074         #define __int16_t   __int16
00075         #define __uint32_t  unsigned __int32
00076         #define __int32_t   __int32
00077         #define __uint64_t  unsigned __int64
00078         #define __int64_t   __int64
00079         #define __int128_t   __int64_t
00080         #define __uint128_t  __uint64_t
00081         #define inline __inline
00082 
00083         // get rid of the GCCism __attribute__
00084         #define __attribute__(X)
00085     #else   // Gcc x compile
00086         #define FUNC_NAME __FUNCTION__
00087 
00088         #define __uint8_t   unsigned char
00089         #define __int8_t    signed   char
00090         #define __uint16_t  unsigned short
00091         #define __int16_t   signed   short
00092         #define __uint32_t  unsigned int
00093         #define __int32_t   signed   int
00094         #define __uint64_t  unsigned long long
00095         #define __int64_t   signed   long long
00096 
00097         #ifndef NORETURN
00098             #define NORETURN __attribute__((noreturn))
00099         #endif
00100     #endif
00101 
00102 #else
00103 
00104     #define FUNC_NAME __func__
00105 
00106     #ifndef NORETURN
00107         #define NORETURN __attribute__((noreturn))
00108     #endif
00109 
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 #include <sys/types.h>
00113 
00114 typedef signed char   SChar;
00115 typedef unsigned char UChar;
00116 typedef __int8_t      Int8;
00117 typedef __uint8_t     Uns8;
00118 typedef __int16_t     Int16;
00119 typedef __uint16_t    Uns16;
00120 typedef __int32_t     Int32;
00121 typedef __uint32_t    Uns32;
00122 typedef __int64_t     Int64;
00123 typedef __uint64_t    Uns64;
00124 #if(IMPERAS_64_BIT_HOST)
00125     typedef __int128_t    Int128;
00126     typedef __uint128_t   Uns128;
00127 #endif
00128 typedef float         Flt32;
00129 typedef double        Flt64;
00130 typedef long double   Flt80;
00131 
00132 //
00133 // Boolean data types
00134 //
00135 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00136     typedef bool  Bool;
00137     #define False false
00138     #define True  true
00139 #else
00140     #include <sys/types.h>
00141 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00142     typedef int _Bool;
00143 #endif
00144     typedef _Bool Bool;
00145     #define False ((Bool)0)
00146     #define True  ((Bool)1)
00147 #endif
00148 
00149 //
00150 // Host-dependent data types
00151 //
00152 #if(IMPERAS_64_BIT_HOST==1)
00153     #define IMPERAS_POINTER_BYTES 8
00154     #define IMPERAS_POINTER_BITS  (IMPERAS_POINTER_BYTES*8)
00155     typedef Uns64                 UnsPS;
00156     typedef Int64                 IntPS;
00157     typedef Uns128                UnsPSx2;
00158     typedef Int128                IntPSx2;
00159 #else
00160     #define IMPERAS_POINTER_BYTES 4
00161     #define IMPERAS_POINTER_BITS  (IMPERAS_POINTER_BYTES*8)
00162     typedef Uns32                 UnsPS;
00163     typedef Int32                 IntPS;
00164     typedef Uns64                 UnsPSx2;
00165     typedef Int64                 IntPSx2;
00166 #endif
00167 
00168 //
00169 // Function attributes
00170 //
00171 #ifndef FASTCALL
00172     #define FASTCALL __attribute__((fastcall))
00173 #endif
00174 
00175 //
00176 // Simulated address types
00177 //
00178 typedef Uns64 Addr;
00179 typedef Int64 Offset;

00197         #define FMT_640Nx  "%016I64x"

00233         #define FMT_NAT8u  "%8u"
00234         #define FMT_NATx   "%x"
00235     #endif
00236 #else
00237     #if (IMPERAS_POINTER_BITS == 64)
00238         #define FMT_SIZETd "%ld"
00239         #define FMT_PTRd   "%ld"

00241         #define FMT_PTRx   "%lx"

00292 //
00293 // Format strings for Addr type
00294 //
00295 #define FMT_Ad   FMT_64d
00296 #define FMT_Au   FMT_64u
00297 #define FMT_Ax   FMT_64x
00298 #define FMT_AX   FMT_64X
00299 #define FMT_A08x FMT_6408x
00300 #define FMT_A0Nx FMT_640Nx
00301 
00302 //
00303 // Format strings for double type
00304 //
00305 #define FMT_DBL   "%e"
00306 
00307 //
00308 // Format string for 64b hex constant
00309 //
00310 #define FMT_64_CONST "0x" FMT_64x "LL"
00311 
00312 //
00313 // Address size
00314 //
00315 #ifndef ADDRESS_SIZE
00316     #define ADDRESS_SIZE (Uns32)(sizeof(Addr)*8)
00317 #endif
00318 
00319 //
00320 // 2 byte endian swap
00321 //
00322 #define SWAP_2_BYTE(_V) \
00323     ({                                                              \
00324         Uns16 _R16;                                                 \
00325         Uns16 _V16 = _V;                                            \
00326         __asm__ ("rorw $8, %w0" : "=r" (_R16) : "0" (_V16) : "cc"); \
00327         _R16;                                                       \
00328     })
00329 
00330 //
00331 // 4 byte endian swap
00332 //
00333 #define SWAP_4_BYTE(_V) \
00334     ({                                                              \
00335         Uns32 _R32;                                                 \
00336         Uns32 _V32 = _V;                                            \
00337         __asm__ ("bswap %0" : "=r" (_R32) : "0" (_V32));            \
00338         _R32;                                                       \
00339     })
00340 
00341 //
00342 // 8 byte endian swap
00343 //
00344 #define SWAP_8_BYTE(_V) \
00345     ({                                                              \
00346         union {Uns64 u64; Uns32 u32[2];} _R64;                      \
00347         union {Uns64 u64; Uns32 u32[2];} _V64 = {_V};               \
00348         _R64.u32[0] = SWAP_4_BYTE(_V64.u32[1]);                     \
00349         _R64.u32[1] = SWAP_4_BYTE(_V64.u32[0]);                     \
00350         _R64.u64;                                                   \
00351     })
00352 
00353 //
00354 // 16 byte endian swap
00355 //
00356 #if(IMPERAS_64_BIT_HOST)
00357 #define SWAP_16_BYTE(_V) \
00358     ({                                                              \
00359         union {Uns128 u128; Uns64 u64[2];} _R128;                   \
00360         union {Uns128 u128; Uns64 u64[2];} _V128 = {_V};            \
00361         _R128.u64[0] = SWAP_8_BYTE(_V128.u64[1]);                   \
00362         _R128.u64[1] = SWAP_8_BYTE(_V128.u64[0]);                   \
00363         _R128.u128;                                                 \
00364     })
00365 #endif
00366 
00367 //
00368 // pointer-sized endian swap
00369 //
00370 #if(IMPERAS_64_BIT_HOST)
00371     #define SWAP_PS_BYTE(_V) SWAP_16_BYTE(_V)
00372 #else
00373     #define SWAP_PS_BYTE(_V) SWAP_8_BYTE(_V)
00374 #endif
00375 
00376 //
00377 // 2 byte conditional endian swap
00378 //
00379 #define SWAP_2_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP) \
00380     ({                                                              \
00381         Uns16 _V16C = _V;                                           \
00382         _DO_SWAP ? SWAP_2_BYTE(_V16C) : _V16C;                      \
00383     })
00384 
00385 //
00386 // 4 byte conditional endian swap
00387 //
00388 #define SWAP_4_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP) \
00389     ({                                                              \
00390         Uns32 _V32C = _V;                                           \
00391         _DO_SWAP ? SWAP_4_BYTE(_V32C) : _V32C;                      \
00392     })
00393 
00394 //
00395 // 8 byte conditional endian swap
00396 //
00397 #define SWAP_8_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP) \
00398     ({                                                              \
00399         Uns64 _V64C = _V;                                           \
00400         _DO_SWAP ? SWAP_8_BYTE(_V64C) : _V64C;                      \
00401     })
00402 
00403 //
00404 // 8 byte conditional endian swap
00405 //
00406 #if(IMPERAS_64_BIT_HOST)
00407 #define SWAP_16_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP) \
00408     ({                                                              \
00409         Uns128 _V128C = _V;                                         \
00410         _DO_SWAP ? SWAP_16_BYTE(_V128C) : _V128C;                   \
00411     })
00412 #endif
00413 
00414 //
00415 // pointer-sized conditional endian swap
00416 //
00417 #if(IMPERAS_64_BIT_HOST)
00418     #define SWAP_PS_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP) SWAP_16_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP)
00419 #else
00420     #define SWAP_PS_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP) SWAP_8_BYTE_COND(_V, _DO_SWAP)
00421 #endif
00422 
00423 #endif /*IMPTYPES_H*/
